profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.2.3 Colour Spaces - 6.2.3.3 Uncalibrated colour spaces - DeviceRGB
profile.description: DeviceRGB may be used only if the file has a PDF/A-1 OutputIntent that uses an RGB colour space
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: DeviceRGB may be used only if the file has a PDF/A-1 OutputIntent that uses an RGB colour space

error.message: DeviceRGB colour space is used without RGB output intent profile
